name: Wen lu- South Island Trail
description:
The main goal of the player in this game is to reach the end of the journey, and the player will explore each level of the journey, during the exploration, it is possible to encounter monsters, campfire breaks, encounter shops, emergencies, etc. Players at each journey chapter point are bound to encounter a boss, at which point the player must defeat the boss to move on to the next chapter, Players will experience the fun of Roguelike from exploration, and this journey to experience the stories of Taiwan's aborigines.

  • Roguelike randomly generated elements
  • Exciting and varied card battles
  • Experience the story of Taiwan's aboriginal culture

This game is only Chinese version
